name: Space Girls TTRPG (Prototype) V0.5
description:
Welcome to Space Girls (The TTRPG)

This is my first attempt at trying to make a game, and I've been loving the experience. The main goal for this was to make a space fairing and simpler version of Shadowrun. I adore Shadowrun, but it's dense and very hard to get people into.

The way this game works is that it's a heavily modified version of PBTA, I only kept the dice results system of 2D6's, and ideally the focus of being mainly about the roleplaying aspect, rather than the combat. Although I did add A LOT of options for if you wanted to fight.

You'll notice that while the rules could occupy maybe 8 pages, the rest of the core rule book is primarily options.

I'm posting it on here because I primarily want to share it with people in order to gain feedback so I can polish this into a complete and fun game. If you play it, and have feedback and suggestions, please let me know, but also please don't be a dick. 

Have fun.
